text: Freeform (formerly ABC Family) is an American basic cable and satellite television channel. It is owned by ABC Family Worldwide Inc. This is part of the Disney-ABC Television Group division of The Walt Disney Company. The channel usually shows modern family programs which are aimed for everyone. However, their shows and movies are aimed at teenage girls and young women (age 15-30). Freeform also offers other shows from other channels. Freeform was founded in 1977. It was first an extension of Pat Robertson's Christian television ministry. It later became The Family Channel in 1990. In 1998, it was sold to Fox Kids. They renamed the channel Fox Family. On October 24, 2001, Fox Family Channel and Fox Family Worldwide were sold to The Walt Disney Company. ==Network slogans== * "Stay with Us" (1977-1985; as CBN Satellite Service and CBN Cable)CBN Logo, YouTube * "Just Watch Us" (1985-1988; as CBN Cable)CBN--TV Aircheck From The Mid 1980's, YouTube * "Together, We're Family" (1988-1991; as The CBN Family Channel)CBN Family Channel" (now ABC Family) Sign-Off from Summer 1989, YouTube * "The Greatest in the Family" (1991-1995; as The Family Channel) * "There's Nothing Stronger" (1995-1996) * "Just Watch Us Now!" (1996-1998) * "You Belong" (1998-present; as Fox Family) * "It's Electric" (2000-2001) * "It's All About You" (2001-2003; as ABC Family) * "Everything You Want to Know from A to Z" (2003-2006) * "A New Kind of Family" (2006-2016) * "The New Name For ABC Family" (2016-present) * Become with us (2016-present) == References == == Other websites == * * TheFutonCritic: ABCFamily * Official YouTube Channel Category:Cable television Category:1977 establishments in the United States Category:American television channels
title: Freeform
